ProjectTitle: Paired electrocatalytic alkane dehydrogenation and CO2 reduction in a multicompartment electroreactor using metal-organic framework based proton conducting membranes
InitialFeedbackHistory:
14/07/2023
Documentation and Metadata: Will your instruments add metadata to help you document the content of the datasets? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage: Please note that box is a cloud solution, not the university's secure environment for private data, but that is not needed since you don't work with personal data. Also note that you now also have onedrive cloud storage linked to you KU Leuven account with more space and no extra costs: https://icts.kuleuven.be/sc/english/storage/onedrive
Preservation: Preserving data on external hard drives is not very secure, the K (archive) drive is a more secure alternative, or have a look at the storage guide for other solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: Since you mention no factors that restrict sharing consider using a repository such as KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository for both data sharing and preservation, for more information see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
